import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import FirebaseContext from '../Firebase' import AuthContext from '../Firebase/AuthContext' import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik' import { Card, Button, Collapse } from 'react-bootstrap' function PostCard(props) { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) let localDisplay = props.comments.map(comment => { return

{comment}

}) return ( {props.user}

{props.title}

{props.content}
{localDisplay}
) } export default PostCard
